author: eth2_bridge_bot
content:
**Tim**
Hey all. Question based on being burned one too many times by wallet UX: Has there been any change on how nonce's are handled in ETH 2 vs. ETH 1? Specifically, will ETH 2 require sequential nonce's per account, just like in ETH 1? 
I had a much larger wall of text describing the pains this causes, though I think I'll spare that if there's already an answer. I also wouldn't be surprised if this has been researched ad nauseam.

author: eth2_bridge_bot
content: Very interesting, would love to hear more. Remember reading about a local optimistic resolver for Eth2, which lets you publish many tx's before the first is confirmed and tell you if your new transactions conflict with the pending ones.
